website_summaries.verdict: The AOC E1659Fwux is a highly portable USB monitor that delivers a crisp 1080p picture and accurate colors.

The AOC E1659Fwu is an affordable 15.6-inch portable USB 3.0 monitor that lets you take your multi-screen setup on the road. Its color accuracy is off, but it delivers a sharp picture and is easy to tote around.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware - It crashed my computer!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware - It crashed my computer! It's possible that the latest Windows update made it not compatible, but I installed the driver and it crashed my computer. I ended up having to wipe the whole thing and reinstall Windows. Upon further investigation I found several mentions that it does not work with Windows 10 - possibly due to the BIOS. I also found on the AOC website, in their instructions, it includes all kinds of Windows versions, but not Windows 10. I'm not super computer saavy, so I stupidly assumed that they would have made it compatible with Windows 10 by now.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin H. Denman

customer_reviews.title: Loved it until I upgraded to High Sierra
customer_reviews.text: I love my second monitor and used it whenever I travelled. It did occasionally blink out but it was very nice to have. Unfortuneately when I upgraded my MacBook Pro to High Sierra it stopped working. I contacted the company and communicated with the company that provided the driver and they had no solution. Sadly I have to find a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Company does not support their product responsibly
customer_reviews.text: Monitor worked well. Bought to use for travel but then didn’t need it. Kept it in the protective neoprene sleeve for Over Six months on a shelf unused. Took it out to use at home and screen display is all fill of lines completely unusable. Contacted Company re return policy. They told me I caused damage therefore no repair. After turning it on once it went back in the package. How could I have damaged it? It is obviously defective yet the company takes no responsibility. I am extremely disappointed with them and I’m out the full amount without being able to use it at all
customer_reviews.author: L Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but brightness problem from some angles
customer_reviews.text: Works well and fits snugly in my backpack. The only problem I have is that there is a lot of bleed-through. Looking at any down angle in portrait mode it looks too bright. Even looking at it straight on is an issue. The picture is actually best viewing from about 20 degrees below center. You can't turn the monitor upside-down in landscape mode, but in portrait you can adjust the angle so it looks good. The side angle doesn't seem to have this problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: This is ideal for a second monitor!
customer_reviews.text: For those of us who have come to accept two monitors as a basic requirement and need to travel, this is ideal. I bought this for my Surface Pro 3. Once I downloaded the drivers it worked perfectly. It's like having a full sized monitor but it's very compact, comes with it's own travel case, and will be a breeze for traveling. I've only had it a few hours and I love it already.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great, portable extended monitor for tablets!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Microsoft Surface Pro 4 and love the tablet because it's lite and I travel but the screen is sometimes just too small when you have multiple spreadsheets open. This monitor is PERFECT as an add on when I need to have a larger, extended monitor. It doesn't require power, I can plug it directly into the USB port on my Surface, and it works fantastic!!! The resolution is GREAT, it came with a nice sleeve so I can carry it with me if I need to. I love this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: KristyLou

customer_reviews.title: Isn't clear and can't adjust brightness with Windows 10!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars except the monitor is not clear or bright when used with Windows 10. I contacted the company, and they gave me a website where I could download a driver for it. I went to that website and it covered every Windows version EXCEPT 10. I relayed that information back to the company, and the response I got was, "You were right this adjustment will not work with Windows 10." REALLY? That's all they had to say. I replied with, "Well why don't you tell me where I can locate a Windows 10 driver, or tell me that one doesn't exist." Stupid.
customer_reviews.author: PattiM

customer_reviews.title: USB connection failed, no warranty
customer_reviews.text: It was great at first. I took it on one work trip and used it for 10 days. I came home and put it away. Today I took it out of it's case to use it. The USB on the monitor itself is faulty. It won't maintain a connection and actually falls out. I just checked the order and the return window closed on March 31 and the product maintenance window closed on April 30. Great. Basically I paid to use this monitor for 10 days in March and that's it! Off the electronics recycle center I guess.
customer_reviews.author: julie

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor until the USB 3.0 connector fails
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent monitor - I work via VPN/remote desktop on it while using the screen on my X1 Carbon for 'Local' and basic Internet. Worked great for a year then the USB connector on the back of the monitor became loose. I was able to tighten it up by bending the outer parts of the connector to make a tight fit - that worked for another 3-4 months. Now the connector is so flaky that the monitor is useless. Bottom line - another piece of E-Waste on the every growing junkpile of E-crap.
customer_reviews.author: Lemmy Caution

customer_reviews.title: Great buy... excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: I've waited for a product like this forever. The quality is excellent for the price. We plan on buying more! Pros - Lightweight / easy to carry and move - USB connection! Love how easy this connects to laptops (minus macs... I haven't figured that out yet). - tall and wide view (it's actually nice to flip it long ways!) - the size -- it's HUGE at the 17" and makes it easy to view spreadsheets/emails while working remotely. Cons - while it's lightweight, it's still bulky and large... like a big iPad. - NOTHING REALLY!
customer_reviews.author: The Simple Baby Life

customer_reviews.title: The monitor itself works well when I can get it ...
customer_reviews.text: The monitor itself works well when I can get it working. I give it a 3 star because in my office i use 2 additional monitors for my laptop and they use a specific monitor driver. When I try and use this product when I am on the road, it forces me to u install my drivers for my office monitors. This created it constant state of me installing and uninstalling the drivers depending on if I am on the road or at home. Frankly, I just stopped using this monitor due to the haste, however, if this is your ONLY monitor you plan to project or extend to, I do reccomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Durham

customer_reviews.title: Great Second Monitor for the Business Traveler Needing to Keep Things Small
customer_reviews.text: Another review I read complained about the screen clarity. If you're buying this to do photographic editing, gaming or other applications where you require a crystal clear screen with lots of resolution, don't buy it. If you're needs are for a compact second monitor to take care of email, web browsing and business apps while traveling, you're in luck. This monitor is perfect for that need. It is extremely compact, it was very simple to set up and I am confident it will serve my business needs. After reading that review, my expectations were low. This second monitor easily exceeded those expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Increased Screen Real Estate!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned one of these for over a year and traveled around the world on business. I liked it so much I purchased a second one recently to add to my new Wali dual monitor stand with the Versa mounting feature. It is light weight and travels well with its neoprene sleeve and fits into my computer backpack with my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: F. V. Plummer II

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 monitors and at first they were working great but then one of them decided to not connect to any computer anymore. Power comes on but will not fully connect. Tried on multiple computers and still didn't work where as the other monitor does still work. It's been just over a year. Connection to the back of the monitor is weak.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: GREAT 2nd screen for my Dell 17" laptop
customer_reviews.text: GREAT 2nd screen for my Dell 17" laptop! No display-delay, when using its USB-input. CRISP, sharp view with this LED screen--much better than the touchscreen I have on my new Dell! Fyi, I don't need to use the USB-power cable that it comes with also. VERY portable--the right size for my PC bag. Its kickstand stays in place, so you don't have to worry about it falling down or over. And- don't use the plug-n-play driver for Windows. Instead, install the driver that it comes with (on CD), so that you can adjust its brightness/contrast etc. If you don't use the manufacturer's driver, then you won't be able to adjust these settings from your laptop.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Frustrating to use - don't use it anymore
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, this looks like a great monitor. However, it is very far from plug-and-play. I plugged it in, it turned on, and then ... nothing. After messing around with drivers and restarts, user manuals and special cords, I gave up on this product. Sometimes, it will kick-on and work. Then, for no reason, it will stop working. I'll troubleshoot and maybe get it working again, maybe not. After a while, the it wasn't worth it anymore. I've stopped using this product and will be hesitant to purchase another AON product in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Great... when it works
customer_reviews.text: The monitor worked great for about six months, but lately it shuts off every time the cord is jostled at all, and when I reboot my computer, it does not connect. I have to continually unplug the cord from the base of the monitor and plug it in again, until the device is recognized. I never used this device for travel. I plugged it in and left it at my workstation. It is acting like there is a loose connection between the cord and the monitor, but if so, this was a manufacturing defect, and not the result of damage to the product after I received it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn P. Cooke

customer_reviews.title: Completely disappointed in the purchase of this monitor
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Completely disappointed in the purchase of this monitor. The installation instructions, both printed and on the CD, are both incomprehensible and are a joke. Tried for unsuccessfully several hours to find online support. Does NOT work with the latest version of Windows. Do not be fooled by the positive review, like I was. I wish I would have read all the 1-star reviews before making this purchase. Not I have to return and find another monitor. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kent Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: All good things can come to an end
customer_reviews.text: I loved this monitor and the flexibility it gave me because I travel for work but then as I owned it for just about it year it just stopped working. I tried new cables and bringing to a repair place and they said because it was the connection point had just failed and due to the way it is constructed would cost more to fix than it cost for a new one. As much as I liked the product I will not be buying a new one each year. I hope they can fix this make it last more than a year and I would consider buying a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great second monitor for travel.
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Plugged right into my laptop without installing any drivers. The video quality is ok. Color fidelity is good for business applications but not for video editing or Photoshop. Video playback is smooth and good FPS but the view angle is very narrow. It comes with a integrated support stand like a old picture frame. The adapter comes with two USB 3 connectors one is for the video and other is for power boost. I didn't experience any problems with excessive power draw. It also comes with a travel case. This makes a great second monitor for business use and other then some minor issues is the best travel monitor I've owned. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nerf Herder

customer_reviews.title: Won't be disappointed unless you want a bigger screen
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little monitor. Well worth the $$. I travel frequently and working on a single 12" display on my HP Elitebook was painful. Works great on Windows 8.1. This monitor comes with a USB cable that plugs into two USB ports. I have tested multiple connections works just as well on a single USB 2.0 port. The display and included case just fits into my swissgear TSA friendly backpack. The fact that it is USB powered eliminates need for another power brick to lug around. Update, works great with Windows 10. There is only lag if you are running on an under powered computer. Movies and Netflix looks great on this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Spamhater007

customer_reviews.title: Can't go back to not having this
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband last year, father's day. He loves it!! It's been 9 months and the monitor is doing well. We both work from home and have 2-3 monitors for each laptop. We can know travel and take this monitor with us, so we can have at least 2 monitors. Brightness is perfect, and there was no hurdle at all connecting it (plug and play) NOTE: If you use a hub/USB adapter, make sure it has enough energy (or, plug directly to the laptop and use the hub for other items). Monitor WON"T work on USB 2 or lower.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: YES!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this thing. It worked on the first try when I plugged it in to my Win7 laptop. I did have issues with my Win10 tablet but it turned out to be a needed Windows update. Since then it's been perfect. I have dual monitors for my home office and wanted the same for travel. This does the trick. I also love the travel sleeve that's included. UPDATE*** still going strong after a year and travelling all over the US. Sometimes in my suitcase, sometimes in my backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Kern

customer_reviews.title: Monitor Worked for approx 10 hour! Totally bummed
customer_reviews.text: Loved my 15 in aoc monitor so much. It was stolen so I purchased this refurbished one in December. I hadn't used it until this past week. Worked well for approximately 10 hours and now will not stay lit up. It flashes on 2-3 seconds and turns off. From what I am reading on Google looks like this is due to an aging capacitator. Really? Unfortunately there is no recourse since I hadn't use it within the Amazon return policy. I haven't had any feedback from aoc.
customer_reviews.author: Marcella Whooley

customer_reviews.title: Non Functional and not good warranty service...
customer_reviews.text: I have never left a review on anything but this screen was TERRIBLE!! It did not work when I received it to take on a trip so I didn't use it and didn't try it again until the return period was over. On 3 different computers it only flickers and will not show anything. I contacted the manufacturer and was told I could send it back to be repaired. The cost to mail it back to be repaired was $20 that the company should have been responsible for considering I have only had it a month and a half. I will never purchase this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Tamica Walker

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product...for home or work.  Travels VERY WELL!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I actually bought 2. Fits perfectly in my work backpack, and I'm able to travel often with it, hence enhancing my work when away from home. I have recommended this to my fellow workers and direct reports. Several have taken me up on the advice. This could not be easier.....unless of course, it was Bluetooth. Oh well. Maybe next year. Still, I do give this product high marks. I'd buy an even larger screen, but it wouldn't travel well. I am considering adding one or two to my existing duel screens at home. I'll let you know how that works out if I do it. Keep up the great work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's easy...plug and play to any laptop, tablet, Xbox that has a USB port.
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. It's easy to use, just plug into laptop and use as additional screen. I use as a third screen when needed. Works well if you are in any training away from your desk. 6.8.18- I've had this monitor for while now. It's gone with me on all business trips and I use as second monitor in hotel room when needed. Travels well and is easy to use. First picture is monitor plugged into laptop and other pictures are the monitor itself. This monitor has no power cord. Once plugged into any USB port, monitor comes on.
customer_reviews.author: AnnMarie Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: It's...just OK.
customer_reviews.text: It's fickle getting it to work, and the screen has a constant buzzing to it. Thankfully I only use it at my home office 1-2 days a week for a second screen. If I needed a dual monitor setup with this thing every day I think the buzzing would make me crazy, and the periodic disconnects would make me smash the thing. Bottom line is it's OK...but not great.
customer_reviews.author: JimboSlice82

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Portable Monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this auxiliary monitor! It has been a blessing to have two screens with my laptop wherever I go. My only wish would be to be able to adjust the brightness. However, this monitor is well built and works great. The neoprene case and cable are handy and also well-made. Do yourself a favor and get the SquareTrade warranty Amazon offers for only a few buck. They're an excellent warranty company!
customer_reviews.author: Romans 10:9-10

customer_reviews.title: Resolution is not great. I had it in my car to attach ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap screen. Resolution is not great. I had it in my car to attach to my laptop when working in our datacenter... needless to say there is no physical appearance of damage and I have been careful during transport. I wiped it down with a screen wipe and there is a large visible line and what looks like a crack in the LCD panel under the protective layer..... I know this is physical damage but I have been careful.... the product is not high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sr. IT Pro

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine, until it didn't
customer_reviews.text: The product worked fine in the beginning, but today as I connected it to my laptop, nothing happened. This also happened to a colleague soon after he purchased it. It seems all my options for returning have expired as well. I purchased it in July of this year, so in less than 3 months, it seems I have no options. I would highly recommend you not purchase this item. It is very unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: tomb523Top Contributor: Smart Home

customer_reviews.title: I love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: I love this monitor. I got it to work with my work laptop. Beautiful resolution and clarity. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars was because I had a difficult time getting it to work on a windows 10 machine. The drivers on the CD are not the correct ones. Look on the “display link” website for the ones with “displaylink windows 10” in the title.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S

customer_reviews.title: Worse Product Ever/Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: The USB cord that connects the monitor to the laptop does not stay connected at the back of the monitor. The cord becomes loose and falls out. I have only had this monitor for 3 months and it is just useless. This is the worst item I have ever bought from Amazon and the worst product experience.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal G.

customer_reviews.title: Defective... don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my first monitor and i believed it was defective. Once plugged in, it worked perfectly for about 3 days then all it would do is blink. I requested a replacement which wss shipped out immediately. This time the monitor worked for about 3 weeks then the same defect appeared. It just blinks. I'm returning for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: V. Foreman

customer_reviews.title: The AOC 17" portable monitor works great. It is very lightweight and has a great ...
customer_reviews.text: The AOC 17" portable monitor works great. It is very lightweight and has a great screen size. I also like the fact that you can use it in Portrait mode (vertical). The screen comes with a case. However, I did not see that anywhere on the listing, so I bought a separate case that I now don't need.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Use with a Mac Mini
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a Mac Mini as my desktop computer, but when it became obvious I would be traveling more, I had a choice: buy a brand new laptop or purchase a portable monitor. I went the portable monitor route and couldn't be happier. It's incredibly light and fits perfect into my Caselgic laptop case ( Yes, the USB port is in a slightly inconvenient place, but that's a very minor quibble. There is no brightness control, but I haven't really needed it. I have only had one program that I have been unable to use with it -- Screenflow 4 -- because it require the GPU. Otherwise, it's been great.
customer_reviews.author: S. Resler

customer_reviews.title: The monitor worked awesome for 3 months now has completely quit working
customer_reviews.text: The monitor worked awesome for 3 months now has completely quit working. I came back to Amazon to see about getting warranty support and the support ended 2 months after purchase. Unless someone can help me find warranty support, buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Bstewart

customer_reviews.title: Useless UBS Port on back of Monitor - No longer functioning
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product one month over a year and the UBS Port is flimsy and no longer works. Don't purchase this product since there is only one option to connect. I've emailed the company and waiting for a response. Update don't purchase this product it is cheapy design, and the company does back up their products. Now I see why it is no longer available. Wish I could give it a negative review doesn't deserve one star. Company replied over purchase date and Closed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great Monitor for travelling
customer_reviews.text: This is a great Monitor for travelling. It took a bit to get the software correctly loaded but once that was done, it worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: John N Heale

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works, but it work suffice for the long term
customer_reviews.text: Great when it works, but it isn't something that would suffice for the long term. The Pros: - Portable / "lightweight" as advertised The Meh: - Uses a USB port (USB a to USB micro b) The Cons: - only one screen brightness - poor colors and no way to adjust - DOES NOT WORK WITH LINUX! (tested on debian 9) I have to admit it's a great screen, but only when it works as intended. What it fails to do is work with Linux. As I specified above, I tested the screen in Debian 9 (Currently stable branch) on my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: cAmiat

customer_reviews.title: Not a true portable monitor - BE AWARE
customer_reviews.text: This monitor has no power cord and it is easy to move. That's as close as it'll get to a portable monitor. It is very flimsy and not meant to be carried on a backpack. In fact, it has the 4 mounting holes on the back for a desk stand just like a regular monitor. Is it easy to move around on the desk? yes; does that makes it portable? NO. Get something else if you plan on putting it on your backpack and working on random places.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S

customer_reviews.title: Great on a PC for travel
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a year while I used my travel laptops and PCs. Connected to my new MacBook; it doesn't function. I downloaded the Displayport drivers as suggested but it is still not working. I get the logo flashing on the monitor and then a menu flashing on the laptop but no amount of reloading/restarting has worked-anyone else?
customer_reviews.author: YB

customer_reviews.title: Great for increased productivity.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup and use and has a convenient carrying case. It works great and has made my job so much easier when comparing different files. The only issue I have with it is the driver is only available on the CD provided. The computer I am using this with does not have a CD drive. I couldn't find the driver on-line so I had to copy the drive set up from the CD to a thumb drive to be able to install it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: I have been waiting for a monitor like this for awhile
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting for a monitor like this for awhile. Middle tier, great for mobile editing and gaming, or for casual browsing without needing to bust out the whole laptop. The AOC 17 inch runs at 1600x900 resolution, which is perfect for 720p gaming, utilizing the extra screen for non-preview workflow, or sitting back and watching a movie while this rests on your lap. There is only one stipulation that follows when purchasing this, and it's very minor. Be sure to purchase a USB 3.0 extension cord for the extra length scaled to your preference. You will need the extra length. ENjoy it if you are strongly considering purchasing. It is worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Boycott

customer_reviews.title: I have had it a few months and it will ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had it a few months and it will no longer work and I guess I am out of my 1 month return window. When I plug it into any computer it just flashes and makes all other screens flash as well. It renders the computer un-usable. DO NOT BUY THIS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Justina L First

customer_reviews.title: Really do like the monitor for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Really do like the monitor for what it is, a GREAT portable monitor that you can throw in a bag. Fantastic for road warriors. I want to rate it five star but just can't due to reliability. Have bought four of these, one out of the box would not work (Returned), one has started repeatedly failing used maybe 20-30 hours (Will Return), one works fine (20-30 hours) and one still sits in a box. UPDATE 03/23: Replacement monitor works great and I've found that using USB 2.0 creates no problems compared to using USB 3.0 at least on this Lenovo W540 laptop. Changing rating to 4 from 2.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Litchfield

customer_reviews.title: Loving my New USB monitor
customer_reviews.text: Came quick and was simple to set up. Resolution was perfect immediately upon starting it up. Make sure you load the software first then plug it in to your computer. If you read the manual it tells you that. I work from home and I am loving this monitor. My computer was supposed to dock on my HP doc and when my new computer came it didn't have the docking port. The USB doc was going to be the same price as this monitor and now I can take it all with me. I like using my laptop keyboard so this all works out for me.
customer_reviews.author: Susan P

customer_reviews.title: Does not work after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor in June of 2017 and my end of June 2019 it no longer worked. This product is very flimsy. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: N. Parra

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until Windows 10. Now brightness can't be controlled and it's too bright to look at and you can't flip to portrait. This is a known problem that was reported a year ago to the DisplayLink software. I just reinstalled the software and no change. Very frustrating because I really liked the monitor before but it's just too bright to use.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really wanted to like this monitor
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this monitor. It's slim and light weight. The colors weren't great but that's what I expected from a usb monitor. The problem with this display is the viewing angle. You can be looking directly at it and notice the colors become saturated at the edges. Tried playing with the limited settings and it looked better but I cannot overlook the inconsistent screen color.
customer_reviews.author: hbluu

customer_reviews.title: It will be fine for that purpose
customer_reviews.text: Bought the monitor for work travel so I wouldn't have to work off my laptop display all day. It will be fine for that purpose, but probably wouldn't be happy with it for day to day use. Can't get the rotation to work and the brightness is static, I can't change it on my Windows 10 operating system [and it's not very bright]. Very lightweight, and included carry case is great.
customer_reviews.author: C Ladd

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: The took a picture of the delivery. Awesome!!!!!! I like that!!!!! Please continue. I purposely put a sign out on my Video Door bell and look out for the delivery from work and sometimes it glitches or I’m busy or in a meeting. This is perfect especially for expensive items. Thank you very much!!!
customer_reviews.author: Glenn T. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought the AOC e1759Fwu 17-Inch Ultra Slim and I gotta say, it was money well spent. It worked as expected and you cant beat the price. I only have 2 gripes. The hardware drivers are a bit wonky on Windows 7 (and not to mention hard to find) and the viewing angles are worse than I had expected (even for a TN panel). Otherwise, I love this product. It has seriously improved my workflow, especially the portrait mode ability.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre Buckley

customer_reviews.title: aoc has always produced excellent equipment, some of my favorite crt's were AOC
customer_reviews.text: i could not have asked for more out of a USB powered 17" monitor. aoc has always produced excellent equipment, some of my favorite crt's were AOC. WILL NOT WORK WHEN SYSTEM IS CONNECTED TO OTHER USB TO HDMI ADAPTERS - STARTECH SPECIFICALLY! [...] is the driver that needs to be installed for this monitor to work properly. again, 5 stars for this monitor, even with the startech conflict.
customer_reviews.author: drew drew

customer_reviews.title: The left side of the screen has a thick 2-3 ...
customer_reviews.text: The left side of the screen has a thick 2-3 inch color line, which you can not see information on that part of your scree, other than that I think the product does what it should do. I purchased a warranty but I have had a difficult time getting them to respond.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie C. Wansley

customer_reviews.title: Broke on second use
customer_reviews.text: Not durable. I put it in my brief case. I guess my notebook was against it - screen is now cracked and the monitor is in the recycle. Absolute waste of money in that neoprene case.... The picture was not the best - it was ok - but I'm sure there are better options. I own several AOC monitors for work (4) but this portable one was a no go.
customer_reviews.author: injeanieous417

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and portable
customer_reviews.text: A great product especially if you are on the go. Does not need a plug outlet just a USB from your c ok computer and the screen will start up. I have noticed that I do have to unplug and plug the monitor in a couple of times as though the m ok nitro isn't catching. I bought an additional USB cord and still am having this issue. But otherwise it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Works great for travel
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is great! I travel for work and it’s lightweight and easy to carry. The only thing I recommend is to get the smaller screen size. It was sold out when I needed one So I got the 17 inch and it doesn’t fit in my backpack so I had to get a separate bag to carry it in.
customer_reviews.author: AUTigerFan02

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great with a Mac
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient for travel, but not perfect. With my Macbook I don't need to use both USB connections, which is good because the cord between them is too short to reach both sides of my Macbook. Also, it doesn't seem that you can use the portrait layout with a Mac. Further, my bluelight filter (F.lux) does not apply to this monitor, so the blue-white light starts to bother my eyes after some time.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I like the bigger screen (17" & 1600x900). I was using a Lenovo LT1421 prior to this. An extra monitor for my laptop is critical for the work I do. Also seems to run just fine on just 1 usb 3.0 port on my HP DV7. I regularly use it in portrait mode for viewing docs. It's almost full size for legal docs. The overall thinner dimension from the previous versions is nice too. Jan 2016: I just bought a 2nd one. Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: David W Wrage

customer_reviews.title: It does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: I like this monitor. It's light, looks good, just plugs in the usb port, install the driver, and you're good to go. I have had it slip off the desk and crash to the concrete floor twice with no problem. My only complaint is that it will not auto rotate with Windows 10 Anniversary update, forcing me to roll back the update. When that problem is solved, I'll probably get a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Been using it a few months without issue. I did have an older laptop running Win 7 that I had to manually install drivers on, but not a problem. I've traveled a few times and all has gone well. My wife liked it so much she got one for herself. As of now I have nothing negative to report.
customer_reviews.author: T. Privatte

customer_reviews.title: Super flaky - some days it works
customer_reviews.text: Super flaky - some days it works, some days it does not. No reason, no changes. I've called support and give up. It's now just a pain to carry around and it's useless. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. Bruch

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is great if you need to have a 2nd monitor while ...
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is great if you need to have a 2nd monitor while on the move. I work from home and can basically set my office up in my living room. If I need to get out of the house it is light enough to take to a local coffee shop. I recommend this for anyone who needs a nice monitor​ that can be set up and tore down quickly.
customer_reviews.author: ShawnChap

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Loving this thing. Using it at home and on the go. The portrait view is great for viewing my code. It's amazing light. The screen quality is OK but, it's not fair to compare it to my Laptop screen. I am also using it to mentor some students and with the screen duplicated and the three foot USB cable I don't have the issue with 6 people trying to look over my shoulder. The stand looks like it wouldn't be very stable but that's not the case. It's very stable in both landscape and portrait. For my usage this is a great buy. After seeing my monitor several friends have purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: CDS III

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for a week
customer_reviews.text: This is my second screen and the second one worked for about a week and now every time I connect it to my laptop it just blinks on and off. I have tried everything.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor with a terrible connection
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about getting the product in and being able to instantly have a 2nd laptop screen for traveling through work. The monitor works great when the connection actually holds. It seems that every time the cable is touched it disconnects and reconnects. COMPLETELY FRUSTRATING when you are trying to get work done. I think I will look around for other options just based off the connection this monitor uses.
customer_reviews.author: Jfschorsch

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great product
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic for travel if you need a lot of screen real estate to work. Easy to use but eats up a lot of USB ports - even if you have a 3.0 port which is what it says you can use without a second port to plug into. More detents on the stand height would also be nice as the single locked in height puts the screen at an inconvenient angle.
customer_reviews.author: S Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Screwed up 2 laptops!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a waste of money and caused me nothing but aggravation and computer issues. It doesn't work when you plug it in. After downloading the driver software on 2 different laptops, it DOES NOT WORK! All of my monitors go black, including this one. So I can't get to a windows screen to uninstall this piece of garbage or to try to fix the display! Be careful! I can't believe everyone else seems to have no problems with this.
customer_reviews.author: Caryn M McGrath

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: It has worked perfectly so far. I bought this to use as a spare monitor when working remotely my old one went out. My employer doesn't allow administrator access to machines, but the driver installed automatically and with no trouble after connecting via USB. I didn't need to use the supplied software. I'm on Windows 7 so I can't respond to any of the concerns mentioned with Windows 10.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great for work. Portability a major plus.
customer_reviews.text: A great easy additional monitor. I use this to add a second screen to my laptop or all-in-one when I am working from home and need the extra screen. The one plug set-up means I can carry it with my laptop. No need for power. Perfect for what it is. Very light weight. Plug and play. Would definitely recommend for work purposes. Not sure how it would be for any serious video viewing or gaming but for my purposes this thing is great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris DC

customer_reviews.title: The monitor stopped working while on a business trip, ...
customer_reviews.text: The monitor stopped working while on a business trip, which is what I purchased it for. I was careful in travel to protect the monitor and kept it with my laptop as a carry on item. The monitor worked well the first two days after travel to the location, but by day three it stopped functioning as if it it had been dropped (it wasn't). I plan to cuntsct the manufacturer because I would expect a portable monitor such as this to be tough enough to withstand a short business trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, but not a fan of the soft ...
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, but not a fan of the soft shell stand. I ended up buying a 3rd party stand for the monitor. Would also be nice if there were mounting features on the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: It's an excellent addition to my portable computing gear
customer_reviews.text: It's an excellent addition to my portable computing gear! The quality is good. The resolution is lower than my laptop, which causes things to be disoriented when dragging from one screen to the other. The drivers came on CD, which most newer laptops don't have. Locating the correct driver on the internet was troublesome it took three tries to get one that worked correctly. Otherwise, I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great for on the go.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for quick easy USB Monitor. Picture quality isn’t too bad but could be better. I have notice it is a little grainy on some things.
customer_reviews.author: Krystene

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: So I have been using this for all of 15 minutes and its working well. Easy to set up, installed quickly with Windows 10. I travel 40 weeks a year, so I will update this review in a few months to let you know how its going, I am a little nervous about the plug issues people have been having but for $100 its worth it even if only for 6 months!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Garofolo

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT RECOMMEND Stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT RECOMMEND Stopped working after 4 months. treated this monitor with kid gloves. Always used the case, tried replacing the flimsy USB cord the monitor came with, no luck. Tried reaching out via phone and email to AOC support with absolutely no response over a three week period. Was going to purchase 7 of these for a team of people who travel. Instead trying the ASUS to see if it works better and has reasonable support.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Review if AOC monitor
customer_reviews.text: The product is plug and play but note that the resolution is low so if your using it for email and stuff. The words get blurry. So it gets hard on the eye when using for long. I would suggest you to double check with your exact resolution requirements. Because you need ur original screen and this AOC screen to both run on the same resolution or else you are facing some serious eye strain.
customer_reviews.author: Thejitha

customer_reviews.title: Good product except having to troubleshoot them occasionally due to ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought three of these for my supervisors at work. They sometimes stop working after software updates and I have to reinstall new drivers (mac) from the website. Besides that they are light, have minimal cables and a decent image. Good product except having to troubleshoot them occasionally due to the driver issues
customer_reviews.author: Ed Tech

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for working while traveling!
customer_reviews.text: We actually purchased this to use with his small work laptop when traveling. We absolutely loves it for a portable monitor. As always, the price on Amazon beat any local stores, so we purchased it here and it arrived in two days so we were able to use it right away. There are no cords or plug in as it's USB powered which is great when traveling. Absolutely perfect for a monitor to use for work when traveling.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferNI

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lightweight portable monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great portable monitor. Excellent, bright sharp display. I use it as my second monitor with my older 17-inch HP Pavillion laptop. Super light and thin for travel - fits in my backpack with my laptop. Very easy to set up and use. Just plug into a USB 3.0 port. Very nice padded case included. Very happy with this purchase! Best image is with screen more upright than at the full angle of the folding stand on the back. No complaints at all with this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: TRK

customer_reviews.title: and it works great.
customer_reviews.text: This monitor was not compatible w/my laptop. It is not "plug and play". Drivers have to be installed. Even after they were installed, it did not work. I kept getting an error msg.saying it was not compatible w/my computer. When I went to the AOC webiste for help, the website did not exist! I then bought the "GeChic" monitor from Amazon, and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: Kimrey A. Hilton

customer_reviews.title: I have purchased this portable monitor twice. First time ...
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this portable monitor twice. First time I purchased did not purchase the extented warranty. The monitor lasted 6 months before the screen went dark. Second purchase purchased extented warranty and the monitor again went black. Attempted to contact manufacturer, whose telephone numbers are in India. Then went to warranty company and they were unable to reach manufacturer. They paid the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Juan F. Rivera, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I freaking love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love this thing. I take it with me everywhere on business trips. It is light, compact, fits into my carry on, my brief case, or even my large suit case (obviously). It sets up nicely on any hotel desk. Only recommendation is to get USB cord extenders to give you flexibility on where to put it. Maybe even bring a portable USB port, as it requires to USB inputs, the extra one for power. Everyone in my office has been buying this now.
customer_reviews.author: Frodsham Fam

customer_reviews.title: Good at first but quality\durability of the product is poor.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about 4 months and it stopped working a few days ago. It never gave the best image quality but was nice to have a second screen for travel. At first a few pixels started to just be white and now half the screen is white and its worthless. I have always kept it in the cover in a laptop bag next to my laptop so don't think it saw anything outside of normal use for a portable screen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plug and Play with Windows 10, Glossy screen
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I don't like about this monitor is the glossy screen. If you are using it in a well lit area, you will get annoying reflections. Otherwise it's plug and play. Plugged it into laptop with Windows 10 and about a minute later the monitor displayed a mirror image of my laptop monitor. Did not have to install anything to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: DaveFred

customer_reviews.title: It works great! Just need the right power!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the product but it is sometimes difficult to use with a Microsoft Surface Pro. You must use the Surface charger USB to provide sufficient power to the monitor. That isn't such a big deal but it seems to make the monitor have issues with staying on. It blinks constantly when I hover my mouse on its screen. In the future, I will try and get a monitor that is matched more effectively to my power output. However, when it works, it is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: twill

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 6months
customer_reviews.text: Avoid this monitor and company. Monitor broke after 6 months of use. Buyer beware. Previous reviews are correct. Poor quality control. Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Great screen!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice extra screen. Even planning to buy a second 1. I edit films, so even tho its not that big of a screen. Its enough. Bright. And you can even use it in portrait. Super response. Comes with CD, but for me plug and play did it.
customer_reviews.author: Re-G Tromp

customer_reviews.title: Wont stay on. Same problem others have had
customer_reviews.text: Wont stay on. Same problem others have had where connection to monitor is very sensitive. The first day it could be made to work by adjusting the connection, now it won't stay on couple of seconds. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Harvey

customer_reviews.title: The product description lists a HDMI input, however there ...
customer_reviews.text: The product description lists a HDMI input, however there is only USB. Additionally, the driver does not work with Windows 10 Creators Update.
customer_reviews.author: Lindaposh

customer_reviews.title: I wanted it to use with my work laptop but the screen is small and my eyes are getting bad because of age
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is light weight and came with a case for protection. I wanted it to use with my work laptop but the screen is small and my eyes are getting bad because of age. The monitor provided the size I needed to be portable and large enough for me to see.
customer_reviews.author: 1AtPeace2019

customer_reviews.title: Great portable monitor
customer_reviews.text: Great portable monitor! I've had this now for several months and it does everything I need. Has a good HD screen, works like a charm. The set up was not without problems - the CD that came with it did not have the right drivers. If you buy this, contact the company directly when you set it up. Once I figured it out - no problems, which is why I'm still giving it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it! If your using a laptop without a ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it! If your using a laptop without a CD drive, you can Google the exact product name and you find a download of the same content on the CD. YOU MUST DO THIS OR THE CD IN ORDER FOR THE MONITOR TO WORK.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: screen is only 50/50
customer_reviews.text: Very poor line of sight on monitor as it fades out a lot if you move left or right / up or down. Okay for temp use... but would not recommend for regular use.
customer_reviews.author: Prymed

customer_reviews.title: Great travel monitor
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase. I bring it with me whenever I travel as my second monitor. It's small and light enough to make it easy to travel with but big enough to do the job. Highly recommend to anyone that needs an extra monitor when they travel.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, but many comprimises in actual design.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to travel with, nice travel bag. Things to be improved: limited viewing angle, limited color palate, rigidity of casing. For those using more than one external screen, it would be great to have a clam-shell design in which two of these screens fold together for storage and travel.
customer_reviews.author: Deese Reviews

customer_reviews.title: At first it was great, but not working after minimal usage
customer_reviews.text: At first it was great, but not working after minimal usage. Not sure if it's the drivers or what. I do know a few folks who have it and use it regularly and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: It worked right away, even from a previous driver installed on my machine. Love the wide screen and the portability as I travel for work. The screen is wide, same size as my large laptop, so it barely fits in my briefcase, but having a large wide screen that I can set up anywhere is well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Troop

customer_reviews.title: Not very bright... Kind of dim. But it works!
customer_reviews.text: The colors seem washed out and dim. Like an iPhone when you turn the brightness down to save your battery. But it does work! It's lightweight and thin. It fits into the laptop bag and it helps. My hope was to use it as the primary monitor but it's too dim and washed out so I need to use it as a secondary monitor.
customer_reviews.author: David
